title: The 14 Points for Management
description: A 15-day journey through Dr. W. Edwards Deming's practical guidance for transformation of management thinking. Learn the theory that drives lasting improvement in quality, productivity, profitability, and competitive position.
learningGoals: Understand the 14 Points as an integrated system requiring continual work
Recognize why and how common management practices undermine quality and productivity
Develop a theory of management based on Deming's principles
Learn to see your organization as a system that management must continually improve
Apply each point to transform how you lead and make decisions
dayTitles: End the Practice of Awarding Business on Price
Remove Barriers to Pride of Workmanship
Put Everybody to Work on Transformation
